list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Removed ffmpeg because it's too big.

list.name: A little bit of comments added

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: A little bit of comments added

task.summary: Expended server protocol
Expended Protocols and Comms both in Server and Client
Fixed some code
Updated Client Comms more similar to Server Comms, made Client Protocol a class, and removed unnecessary imports
Updated comments.
Added the DB class
Cleaned the DB class
Just 1 line
Updated the DB class to be the admins db class
Updated the DB class to be the admins db class
Added the option to get the email and the full name of a username, also the option to check if passwords match
Changed fullName to full_name, and changed a little of the main function where I test the DB functions
Added the function to be able to check if the email already exists in the database, and applied some conventions suggestions
Applied some conventions suggestions, and created the server graphics class
Updated the DB class
Updated the DB class and made it 2 tables instead of 1, the admins table and the cameras table, the admins table is probably finished, the cameras table needs some more functions (:

Added more function to deal with the Camera aspect of the DB, the functions lets you: - Check if the position of the camera is already taken. - Update the place of the camera. - Update the position of the camera.
Made some changes according to conventions.
Small grammar fix
Minor conventions fixed
Updated the add_camera function to check the position and not just the MAC address, Added a remove_camera function.
Created the class for sounding the alarm.
Added a function to get a camera's info based on its ID.
Destroying the ListFrame instead of hiding and showing it, making it restart the list.
Destroying the ListFrame instead of hiding and showing it, making it restart the list.
Fixed Alarm class
Updated comms and camera

Last version of camera graphics before camera integration.
TestWX is a test file for testing CV2 integration inside of WXPython
Changed cv2.VideoCapture(0) to cv2.VideoCapture(cv2.CAP_DSHOW) in order to get rid of annoying black bars on the camera stream.
Added main client
Changed setting ip
Camera connected bug still exists.
Recording working, stream freezes...

Working face detection, alert, email, zoom, missing settings screen and more small details.
Recording sometimes doesn't work, images works.
(:
Added the settings screen between the log in screen and the main screen.
Added the settings screen between the log in screen and the main screen.
Changed files according to some python conventions, and removed and moved files not used\needed.
Added files that existed already to GitHub.
Settings in graphics now gets the data from the table and puts them in, still needs to update tables on submit.
Added update functions in the Database, made it so when the user submits the client camera settings, it updates it.

Added the option to clear the selection in the cameras table (Currently only works with drag selection).
Moved the creation of the main panel only after the settings phase is done (So that the database will be updated).

Added a function to get all the managers names, and added the manager's name when sending an email.
Removed some prints.
Admins settings now works, the full name and email are changeable.
Recording resets at midnight.
Recording resets at midnight.
Status and title added.
Organized the files to server and client files, and added comments on graphics, added ffmpeg to directory.
Removed ffmpeg because it's too big.

MESSAGE.value: Created the class for sounding the alarm.
Added a function to get a camera's info based on its ID.
Destroying the ListFrame instead of hiding and showing it, making it restart the list.
Fixed Alarm class
Updated comms and camera

Last version of camera graphics before camera integration.
TestWX is a test file for testing CV2 integration inside of WXPython

Working face detection, alert, email, zoom, missing settings screen and more small details.

(:

Added files that existed already to GitHub.
Settings in graphics now gets the data from the table and puts them in, still needs to update tables on submit.

Added the option to clear the selection in the cameras table (Currently only works with drag selection).
Moved the creation of the main panel only after the settings phase is done (So that the database will be updated).

Added a function to get all the managers names, and added the manager's name when sending an email.
Removed some prints.
Admins settings now works, the full name and email are changeable.
Recording resets at midnight.
Status and title added.
Organized the files to server and client files, and added comments on graphics, added ffmpeg to directory.
Removed ffmpeg because it's too big.
